title: First flights to Sharm el Sheikh confirmed as UK lifts travel ban
text:

The first flights from the UK to Sharm el Sheikh have been confirmed following the news that the UK is lifting restrictions on flights to the Egyptian destination.

The FCO lifted a ban on flights this week, which was first put into place in 2015 after the bombing of a Russian airliner left 224 dead.

Hours after the flight restrictions were relaxed, Red Sea Holidays has announced their first charter flights to Sharm el Sheikh will take off from Sunday 22nd December from London Gatwick.

The flights are available to book on the Red Sea Holidays website from this evening (Tuesday 22nd October) as part of holiday packages.

They are set to run weekly throughout the winter season, and will be operated by airline Enter Air.

(Image: Valery Sharifulin/TASS)

Prices start from £479pp for seven night all-inclusive stays at the Sharm Resort Hotel, including your flights, 20kg checked luggage, resort transfers and late check out.

It marks another expansion for the travel firm which earlier this year launched three new weekly flights to Hurghada from Gatwick, Birmingham and Manchester following the demise of Thomas Cook.

(Image: Getty Images)

It's not the only travel firm looking to re-open routes and holidays to Sharm el Sheikh following the lifted restrictions.

UK firms such as easyJet and TUI have already said they are considering their options and looking at whether there is the possibility of bringing back holidays and routes.

A spokesperson for TUI told Mirror Online: "Sharm el Sheikh was always a popular holiday destination with our customers and we welcome the change in travel advice by the UK government.

"We will reintroduce Sharm el Sheikh, taking into account customer demand, and will now work closely with our hotel and airport partners so we can confirm more details in due course."

The FCO updated its Egypt travel advice on Tuesday explaining that they "no longer advise against all but essential travel by air to/from Sharm el Sheikh".
description: The first flights to the UK from Sharm el Sheikh have been confirmed after flight restrictions have been lifted
